short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that groups your tabs for you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that utilises the tab groups feature of Chrome to group all of your opened tabs at ease.
